tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: Configure a daily-running Quartz job to

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_quartz_job_class (jc_id,jc_name, jc_class_fullname) VALUES (nextval('amp_quartz_job_class_seq'),'Automatically close expired unclosed activities', 'org.digijava.ampModule.message.jobs.CloseExpiredActivitiesJob');
